name: Hamster Seasons
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam #33:

Themes: triangles, 3 butttons, 3 minute gameplay

The year is going by, how many sunflower seeds can you stock up on before the year ends? Don't touch the season enemy, or you'll lose!!

CONTROLS:

L/R: rotate the die to desired direction

x: use to move in direction on die/ restart game
